title: FTP Access Misconfiguration
description: Explore an FTP server with improper permissions that expose sensitive files.
hints: Check the FTP server's anonymous access configuration.
Try navigating to directories other than the default one.
Sensitive files may be exposed due to improper permissions.
learningObjectives: Understand FTP server configuration and permission settings.
Learn to identify common misconfigurations in FTP access.
Practice forensics skills in a controlled environment.
